name: GTK GUI
description: Custom GTK GUI channel for Linux desktop - communicates via Unix socket or file-based IPC

socketPath.description: Unix socket path for IPC communication

inboxPath.description: File path for incoming messages (alternative to socket)

outboxPath.description: File path for outgoing messages (alternative to socket)

liteMode.description: Enable lite mode for small local models (e.g., Ollama 1B/3B). Bypasses the full Pi agent system prompt for faster, simpler responses.
